text: The 2019–20 season was Al-Nassr's 44th consecutive season in the top flight of Saudi football and 64th year in existence as a football club.http://www.alnassrfc.com/ Al-Nassr enter the season as the Saudi Pro League title holders. Along with the Pro League, the club competed in the King Cup and both the 2019 and the 2020 editions of the AFC Champions League. The season covered the period from 1 July 2019 to 3 October 2020. ==Players== ===Squad information=== ===Out on loan=== ==Transfers and loans== ===Transfers in=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
